channel.title: How to make you must have my client to play?
channel.description:
Hello,
Im not sure to post this at client help, or server help. because this is mostly server sided, i decined to post here.
So, how cna i make you must have my client to play? It was something with UID, i know that.
Thanks, I D D S I

item.title: How to make you must have my client to play?
item.dc:creator: @demonnd demonnd
item.description:
@demonnd wrote:

well it needs that exact uid you put in to connect =/

item.title: How to make you must have my client to play?
item.dc:creator: @I_D_D_S_I I D D S I
item.description:
@I_D_D_S_I wrote:

tested it,

but the != give me the dissconect (returnCode 22)
And > make me connect fine.
And < make me dissconect (returnCode 22)
How i gotta make only my uid work,

Like, everything lower, or higher then my uid automatic get the returnCode 22

Please help me, thanks.

Read full topic
item.source: How to make you must have my client to play?

item.title: How to make you must have my client to play?
item.dc:creator: @demonnd demonnd
item.description:
@demonnd wrote:

god idk well i gave you what i know and i dont feel like going across the house to get my flash drive to get my server
but if you really want it ill do it just give me a sec
[br][br][size=1]Posted on: September 24, 2009, 05:19:20 pm[/size][hr]ok ill give you server side because client side is explained some what well =/
REMEMBER THIS IS IN YOUR SERVER FOLDER NOT YOUR CLIENT FOLDER
open client.java and search checkbannedips();
til you get to something like this if (checkbannedips() == 5) { returnCode = 4; System.out.println( playerName + " failed to logon because their ip is banned."); appendToLR( playerName + " failed to logon because their ip is banned."); savefile = false; disconnected = true; }
now under that add if (UID != 18273646) { returnCode = 22; disconnected = true; savefile = false; //printOut("User not using latest/official client."); }
change the 18273646 to what ever UID you put in your signlink.java

Read full topic
item.source: How to make you must have my client to play?

item.title: How to make you must have my client to play?
item.dc:creator: @I_D_D_S_I I D D S I
item.description:
@I_D_D_S_I wrote:

[quote=“demonnd, post:4, topic:304094”]… ill get you the link just a sec

EDIT:YES I WROTE THIS IN LIKE FIVE MINS IM IN A HURRY

nvm they removed it and i don’t feel like writing a mini tut right now considering i just wrote one
and i am positive there was one cuz i i did this with mine ill tell you a very small way
go into your signlink.java in your client’s folder and search UID until you see a long number
you can change this or keep it the same idc just make it the same amount of digits
remember it or copy it down
then in your server folder open client.java declare your UID (cant remember were though)
then add something like if (UID != UID#HERE) { returnCode = 22; disconnected = true; savefile = false; //printOut("User not using latest/official client."); }
AND YOUR DONE
notes:
ok first some one clean this up i gtg
second there is a certain spot to declare
third this WILL give you errors
forth where it says UID#HERE put that number you copied down right there
thanks please post
~ Demonnd[/quote]

Hey, nice but where i gotta place it,

also what do i have to declare?
Gotta replace it with this? :

// misc.println("UserId: "+inStream.readDWord()); int junk = inStream.readDWord(); playerName = inStream.readString(); int expectedUid = 50; if (junk == expectedUid) { println("Devolution.com client detected!"); officialClient = true; } if (expectedUid == -47785) { officialClient = true; disconnected = false; } else { officialClient = false; disconnected = true; }

and what to declare:d

item.title: How to make you must have my client to play?
item.dc:creator: @demonnd demonnd
item.description:
@demonnd wrote:

… ill get you the link just a sec

EDIT:YES I WROTE THIS IN LIKE FIVE MINS IM IN A HURRY

nvm they removed it and i don’t feel like writing a mini tut right now considering i just wrote one
and i am positive there was one cuz i i did this with mine ill tell you a very small way
go into your signlink.java in your client’s folder and search UID until you see a long number
you can change this or keep it the same idc just make it the same amount of digits
remember it or copy it down
then in your server folder open client.java declare your UID (cant remember were though)
then add something like if (UID != UID#HERE) { returnCode = 22; disconnected = true; savefile = false; //printOut("User not using latest/official client."); }
AND YOUR DONE
notes:
ok first some one clean this up i gtg
second there is a certain spot to declare
third this WILL give you errors
forth where it says UID#HERE put that number you copied down right there
thanks please post
~ Demonnd
